scripts.dev:watch: npm run clean && mkdirp build/backend && parallel build-ts-backend:watch serve:backend:watch frontend:dev:watch
scripts.dev:watch:low-memory: npm run clean && mkdirp build/backend && cp -r src/backend/assets build/backend && parallel build-ts-backend:watch serve:backend:watch:low-memory
scripts.backend:dev:watch-no-frontend: npm run clean && mkdirp build/backend && parallel build-ts-backend:watch serve:backend:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch:low-memory-no-frontend: npm run clean && mkdirp build/backend && parallel build-ts-backend:watch serve:backend:watch:low-memory
scripts.frontend:dev:watch:wait: wait-on build/backend/server.js && cd src/frontend && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true npm start
scripts.dev:backend:watch-build-frontend: npm run clean && mkdirp build/backend && mkdirp build/frontend && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true npm run build-frontend && parallel build-ts-backend:watch serve:backend:watch
scripts.build-frontend: cd src/frontend && npm install && wait-on node_modules/ && SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true npm run build && wait-on build/ && cp -R build/ ../../build/frontend
scripts.serve:backend:watch: nodemon -C -d 1 --ext js --watch build/backend --exec "wait-on build/backend/server.js && node --inspect -r dotenv/config build/backend/server.js"
scripts.serve:backend:watch:low-memory: nodemon -C -d 1 --ext js --watch build/backend --exec "wait-on build/backend/server.js && node --max-old-space-size=450 --inspect -r dotenv/config build/backend/server.js"
scripts.create-database: npm run clean && npm run build-ts-backend && node -r dotenv/config build/scripts/createDatabase.js
scripts.serve-frontend-from-backend: npm run clean && mkdirp build/backend && mkdirp build/frontend && npm run build-frontend && parallel build-ts-backend:watch serve:backend:watch
